data.title: Florida officials share initiative to address substance abuse, violence in schools
data.meta_description: R.J. Larizza, state attorney of the 7th Judicial Circuit, held a news conference Thursday morning in Bunnell with four county superintendents to announce an initiative focused on communicating to students the harms of violence and substance abuse, most specifically that of vaping.
